text: 元彬也听见了，他的手指屈起摩擦过李炤熙缺少水分滋润的下唇上，忍不住按压那唇肉，似乎想让他张不开嘴，把叫唤咽到肚子里，一直在叫别的男人的名字，出去工作一趟，倒是去勾引男人了吧？ 胸口那么淫乱也敢回来就躺在这里毫无防备地被人看见，哼哼唧唧的还想让别人伺候，元彬捏着另一头的手劲不由自主地变大，听见李炤熙的叫声满足了他的心理，被别人玩的早已敏感硬挺的乳头，李炤熙就算是睡着了也被玩的 挺起了胸，就这么喜欢被人侵犯乳头吗？
trans: Yuan Bin hearing it, his fingers curled up and rubbed over the dry lower lip of Li Zhaoxi, and he couldn’t help but press the lip as if wanting to prevent him from opening his mouth and swallowing the cries. Li Zhaoxi kept calling another man’s name. you went out to work for a while, and ended up seducing a man? With such a lewd chest, he still dared to come back and lie here without any guard, being seen by others, moaning and wanting to be served by others. Yuan Bin’s grip on the other end tightened involuntarily. Hearing Li Zhaoxi’s cries satisfied his mind, and the former’s nipples had become sensitive and hard from being played with by the other. Even if Li Zhaoxi was asleep, his chest still rose up from being played with. So fond of having his nipples assaulted?
